nodes.title: I.2. Residential Structures in Other Locations: Religious and Elite Residences
Setrap Tsam KhangBse khrab mtshams khang
Oral tradition
nodes.body: According to the residents of nearby TaraRta ra monastery, nyingmaparnying ma pa meditators used Setrap Tsam KhangBse khrab mtshams khang for many centuries. It is said that six meditation cells in the edifice were intact until the Chinese Cultural Revolution. Much of the structure was then dismantled to construct livestock pens on the site. These corrals have fallen out of use and many of the stones have been carried off.
